actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

actions.subcommittee: International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services

official_title: A bill to provide wage parity for certain Department of Defense prevailing rate employees in Georgia.

summary.text: Declares that the wage schedules and rates applicable to prevailing rate employees of the Department of Defense (DOD) in the Macon, Georgia, wage area shall be the same as the wage schedules and rates applicable to DOD prevailing rate employees in the Atlanta, Georgia, wage area.

titles.title: A bill to provide wage parity for certain Department of Defense prevailing rate employees in Georgia.
